item.name: Api Auth
Get the Bearer Access Token to access Suger API

request.description: Get the Bearer Access Token by giving the Suger API Client ID & Client Secret.

item.name: Buyer
List all buyers under the organization
Get the buyer
Update the name & description of the buyer
Entitlement
Add Credit Amount in Entitlement.

request.description: Add Credit Amount to the given Entitlement. The credit amount is accumulated & saved in the current Entitlement Term of the gvien Entitlement.

item.name: List all entitlements of the buyer
List all entitlements under the organization
Get entitlement
Update entitlement name
List all entitlements under the offer
List all entitlements under the partner
List all entitlements under the product
Entitlement Term
List all Entitlement Terms of the Entitlement.
Get an Entitlement Term.
Integration
List all integrations under the organization
Create an integration.

request.description: For each organization, partner & service, there should be at most one integration.

item.name: Get the integration for the given organization, partner & service.
Delete the integration.
Update the integration.
Verify the integration, check whether it works correctly.
Metering
list all UsageRecordGroups under the given entitlement
Report new UsageRecordGroup.

request.description: It is recommended to provide the ID in the request body CreateUsageRecordGroupParams, so the report can be deduplicated. All duplicate report will return error code 409.

item.name: list all UsageRecordReports under the given entitlement

query.description: The Entitlement Term ID, if not given, return the UsageRecordReports of all Entitlement Terms under the Entitlement

item.name: list all UsageRecordGroups under the given product
list all UsageRecordGroups under the given organization
get an UsageRecordGroup by organization_entitlement_usage RecordGroup id
Offer
List all offers under the organization
Create a private offer.
Get the offer.
Delete the offer.

request.description: Currently only the offer with status = "CREATE_PENDING" or "CREATE_FAILED" is allowed to be deleted.

item.name: List all offers under the cloud partner.
List all offers under the product.
Operation
list all long running operations under the given organization, offer or entitlement.

request.description: The operations can be filtered by offerId or entitlementId. If both of them are provided, then it is filtered by entitlementId only.

item.name: Product
List all products under the cloud partner
List all products under the organization
Create an Product & List it to the Partner's marketplace.
Get the Product
Delete the product.

request.description: Currently only the product with status = "CREATE_PENDING" or "CREATE_FAILED" is allowed to be deleted.

item.name: Currently, only the Fulfillment URL is allowed to update.
List the Metering Dimensions of the Product
Report
Get the revenue report.

request.description: Get the revenue report of the given organization, product, entitlement, or buyer.

item.name: Get the usage report.

request.description: Get the daily usage report of the given entitlement, the default timespan is lifetime.
